title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs as a single Go binary with a REST API and CLI.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for chatting with Ollama models, embeddings, and pulling models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM and embedding wrappers.

title: Ollama Web UI
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (React/Flask) for Ollama with folders, sharing, prompts, multimodal support.

title: ollama4j – Java Client
summary: Lightweight Java/Kotlin library wrapping the Ollama REST API with model management helpers.

title: OllamaSharp – .NET Client
summary: .NET Standard 2.0 C# client for Ollama including chat, embeddings and model operations.

title: ollama-rb – Ruby Gem
summary: Ruby wrapper for the Ollama REST API with idiomatic model/chat helpers.

title: ollama-cli (Node)
summary: Enhanced Node CLI for Ollama with prompt templates, conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: Ollama Copilot – VS Code Extension
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline code completion and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: Ollama Discord Bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for summarizing notes, generating text and Q&A using Ollama models locally.

title: Ollama Function Calling (Experimental)
summary: Example showing how to add OpenAI-style function calling to any Ollama model via prompt engineering.

title: ollama-cam – Real-time Vision
summary: Python script that feeds webcam frames to llava (multimodal) via Ollama for real-time description.

title: Ollama Reddit Community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, integrations and feature requests around Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset enabling Ollama models as Generators and Embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers with selected models for CI-based LLM testing.

title: Ollama on Hugging Face Spaces
summary: Official Hugging Face Space demo running Ollama in-browser with selectable models and shareable links.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Lightweight Python Slack bot using Socket-Mode to chat privately or in channels with Ollama.
